job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>We at neteffects are looking for a motivated <strong>Data Scientist</strong> for our direct client.</p><p>No C2C but Neteffects sponsor work visas. This is a Remote position.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Required Skills:</strong></p><p> • Ph.D. (or MS with 4+ years of post MS experience) in Statistics, Geo-statistics, Mathematics or closely related field.</p><p> • 2 years of experience in using machine learning, artificial intelligence &amp; statistical methodologies to solve research problems.</p><p> • Proficiency in Python or in another high-level programming language.</p><p> • Experience in developing statistical, and machine learning models for environmental and agronomical applications.</p><p> • Experience analyzing and presenting complex data and proven problem-solving abilities.</p><p> • Strong organizational, interpersonal, and written communication skills.</p><p> </p><p> <strong>Desired Skills:</strong></p><p> • Experience working with agricultural/biological scientific data is highly desired.</p><p> • Experience working with various environmental data and categorizing environmental variabilities using geospatial model and approach is highly desired.</p><p> • Familiarity with geospatial data and tools and techniques required to explore geospatial data is highly desired.</p><p> • Familiarity with deep learning architectures and techniques as well as constructing and evaluating these models.</p><p> • Drive for translating business problems into research initiatives that deliver business value.</p><p> • Creativity in defining challenging exploratory projects.</p><p></p>
